description: Maximal run length in base 12 representation of n.
comments: For all numbers n in A023806, a(n)=1, but this holds also for others, e.g., n=145, not in A023806. The same relation holds for the terms of A113763 less than n=144, but becomes wrong from then on. - _M. F. Hasler_, Jul 24 2013
prog: (PARI) A043287(n, b=13){=my(m, c=1); while(n>0, n%b==(n\=b)%b&&c++&&next; m=max(m, c); c=1); m} \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Jul 23 2013
crossrefs: Cf. A043276-A043290 for base-2 to base-16 analogs.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
